name: roomready
description: The ultimate App for guests to be in the know about their stay.

scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npx wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.render-build-seed: npm run install && npm run build && npm run seed
